headline.seo: Poor Participation Hobbles California’s Drug Oversight

docs.snippet: Enrollment is optional for California’s drug-monitoring database program. The system has drawn few participants, and in November, it shut down temporarily because of budget cuts....
docs.lead_paragraph: Enrollment is optional for California’s drug-monitoring database program. The system has drawn few participants, and in November, it shut down temporarily because of budget cuts.

headline.print_headline: Tuna Again? In Fault-Finding Britain, It’s a Cause for Divorce
headline.seo: Divorce, English Style: Fault-Finding as Fine Art
headline.main: Tuna Again? In Fault-Finding England, It’s a Cause for Divorce

docs.snippet: Excessive servings of tuna casserole is just one example of marital distress from the divorce dockets of England, which does not have no-fault divorce....
docs.abstract: Many English matrimonial lawyers and judges are campaigning to change laws to allow for no-fault divorce; absence of such a provision keeps courts flooded with spurious debates over superficial, and sometimes humorous, domestic disputes as spouses accuse each other of 'unreasonable behavior,' one of five categories under which divorce can currently be granted.
docs.lead_paragraph: Excessive servings of tuna casserole is just one example of marital distress from the divorce dockets of England, which does not have no-fault divorce.

headline.print_headline: As Large Companies Opt Out, Concerns Grow for Workers’ Compensation System
headline.seo: Fears Grow for Workers’ Compensation System as Large Texas Companies Opt Out
headline.main: As Large Companies Opt Out, Concerns Grow for Workers’ Compensation System

docs.snippet: Walmart set up its own plan for occupational injury claims in Texas, the only state that allows employers of any size to decline to carry public workers’ compensation coverage....
docs.lead_paragraph: Walmart set up its own plan for occupational injury claims in Texas, the only state that allows employers of any size to decline to carry public workers’ compensation coverage.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Defines Its Demands For Iran Talks
headline.main: U.S. Defines Its Demands for New Round of Talks With Iran

docs.snippet: The Obama administration and its allies plan to call for the immediate closing and ultimate dismantling of a recently completed nuclear facility, American and European diplomats say....

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

docs.abstract: Obama administration and its European allies plan to open new negotiations with Iran by demanding the immediate closing and ultimate dismantling of a recently completed nuclear facility; they will call for a halt in the production of highly-enriched uranium fuel, and are gambling that sanctions and the threat of Israeli military action will bolster the arguments of those Iranians who say a negotiated settlement is far preferable to isolation and more financial hardship.

byline.original: By DAVID E. SANGER and STEVEN ERLANGER
byline.contributor: David E. Sanger reported from Washington, and Steven Erlanger from Paris.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Obama administration and its allies plan to call for the immediate closing and ultimate dismantling of a recently completed nuclear facility, American and European diplomats say.
